about_the_game:
This demo is presented in the form of a short Prequel, bringing together the main mechanics of Clocked, so that you can enjoy the whole game without giving anything away.
This demo is both a preview and a complement to Clocked.
detailed_description:
This demo is presented in the form of a short Prequel, bringing together the main mechanics of Clocked, so that you can enjoy the whole game without giving anything away.
This demo is both a preview and a complement to Clocked.
name: CLOCKED - Prequel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller or Mouse/Keyboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller or Mouse/Keyboard

short_description: This demo is presented in the form of a short Prequel, bringing together the main mechanics of Clocked, so that you can enjoy the whole game without giving anything away.This demo is both a preview and a complement to Clocked.
